description:
The European Parliament today approved the AI Act, the first ever regulatory framework governing the use of AI systems. The legislation passed with an overwhelming majority of 523 votes in favour, 46 against and 49 abstentions. “This is a historic day,” said Italian lawmaker Brando Benifei, co-lead on the AI Act. “We have the first... Read more »

The post EU approves controversial AI Act to mixed reactions appeared first on AI News.
title: EU approves controversial AI Act to mixed reactions
